0 CLS:CLEAR400,36762:I=RND(-(PEEK(9)*256+PEEK(10))):FORI=0TO103:POKE36762+I,PEEK(64022+I):NEXT:DATA49,49,60,55,54
1 FORI=0TO4:READC2:POKE36762+I,C2:NEXT:POKE36855,32:POKE17033,143:POKE17034,154:POKE17032,126:GOTO2000
2 CLS.:FORI=1TO16:PRINT@508,"":NEXT:RETURN
3 M$=MID$(TB$,INT((L(104)-49)/6)*8+1-(L(.)=90)*8,8):PRINT@28,LEFT$(M$,4);:PRINT@60,MID$(M$,5,4);:RETURN
5 FORN=17TO47:L(N)=RND(86)+3:NEXT:L(48)=90
6 A$="¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿":O=.5:X$="                                             ":X$=X$+X$
7 P=0:FORN=49TO95
8 I=RND(86)+3:IFMID$(X$,P+I,1)<>" "THEN8
9 X$=LEFT$(X$,P+I-1)+"-"+MID$(X$,P+I+1):L(N)=I:NEXT:X$="":L(96)=90
10 TA$=" !    ABCDEF #    ABCDEFABCDEFABCDEFABCDEF (     )    ABCDEF +    ABCDEF -     .     /     0    "
11 TB$="ASP     EVILDUSTLIVEAXE SKELETONMUM-MY  GRAYOOZEOGRE    LICH    DEMILICH"
12 L(3)=RND(86)+3:L(8)=RND(86)+3:L(9)=RND(86)+3:L(11)=RND(86)+3:L(13)=RND(86)+3:L(16)=RND(86)+3
13 PRINT@486,"HIT ANY KEY TO BEGIN";
14 X$=INKEY$:IFX$=""THEN14
15 IFX$="$"THENL(9)=1:L(13)=1
16 CLS0:SOUND100,1:L(1)=1:L(15)=1:L(.)=1:L(97)=28:L(98)=8:L(99)=9999
17 GOSUB920:GOSUB500:IFL(104)=.THEN19
18 L(103)=(L(104)-49)*150+5000-(L(.)=90)*1000:GOSUB3:L(105)=1
19 GOSUB900
20 PRINT@476,MID$(STR$(INT(L(99)))+"    ",2,4);
24 D=PEEK(2)ANDPEEK(17023):IFD=.THEN110
25 IFD>72THENIFD<77THEN260
106 GOSUB920:IFD<57ANDD>48THEN230
107 IFD<70ORD>90THEN110 
109 OND-64GOTO110,110,110,110,110,290,110,110,110,110,110,110,110,110,110,110,240,110,250,210,110,110,110,110,110,110
110 IFL(104)=.THEN127
111 X=L(101)+SGN(L(97)-L(101))*L(105):Y=L(102)+SGN(L(98)-L(102))*L(105):D=PEEK(O*(X+G*Y)+M):IFDTHEN116
112 GOSUB920:GOSUB3:POKE49151,64:FORC=1TO25:NEXT
113 SOUND1,1:L(105)=-1:L(106)=RND(20):L(99)=L(99)-L(103)/8:IFL(8)=91THENL(99)=L(99)+500:GOSUB995
114 IFL(99)>.THEN124
115 GOTO129
116 IFD=32ORD=42THENPOKEO*(L(101)+G*L(102))+M,32:L(101)=X:L(102)=Y:POKEO*(X+G*Y)+M,42:GOTO123
117 ON-(D=191)GOTO120:IFD=48THENFORI=1TO20:POKEO*(X+G*Y)+M,RND(64)+128:NEXT:POKEO*(X+G*Y)+M,32:L(16)=RND(87)+3:GOTO126
118 IFD=46THENPOKEO*(X+G*Y)+M,32:L(99)=L(99)+RND(4000)+2000:GOSUB995:GOTO123
119 IFD=43THENPOKEO*(X+G*Y)+M,32:L(99)=9999:L(11)=RND(87)+3:GOTO123
120 IFL(105)=-1THENL(105)=1:GOTO123
121 FORI=1TO3:X=L(101)+RND(3)-2:Y=L(102)+RND(3)-2:D=PEEK(O*(X+G*Y)+M):IFD=32ORD=42THEN116
122 NEXT
123 IFL(105)=-1THENL(106)=L(106)-1:IFL(106)<1THENL(105)=1
124 IFL(107)>1THEN127
125 L(103)=L(103)-1:IFL(103)>.THEN127
126 POKEO*(L(101)+G*L(102))+M,32:PRINT@28,"IT'S";:PRINT@60,"DEAD";:GOSUB991:L(L(104))=0:L(104)=0
127 L(107)=L(107)-1:IFL(107)>.THEN20
128 L(107)=10:L(99)=L(99)-1:IFL(99)>.THEN20
129 FORI=1TO8:L(C(I))=L(.):C(I)=.:NEXTI:L(100)=L(100)+1
130 CLS0:POKE49151,64:PRINT@192,"YOU ARE QUITE DEAD, BUT WE CAN  RESURRECT YOU! WHEN YOU ARE     READY, PRESS <ENTER>"
131 X$=INKEY$:IFX$=CHR$(13)THEN16
132 GOTO131
210 FORK=1TO8:IFC(K)<>.THENNEXTK:PRINT@28,"TOO ";:PRINT@60,"MUCH";:GOTO110
212 N=INT(O*(L(97)+G*L(98)))+M-33:FORI=NTON+64STEP32:FORJ=.TO2:A=PEEK(I+J)-32:IFA>.ANDA<17ANDA<>10ANDA<>6THEN214
213 NEXTJ,I:PRINT@28,"TAKE";:PRINT@60,"WHAT";:GOTO110
214 POKEI+J,32:IFA=11THENL(99)=9999:PRINT@28,"ALL";:PRINT@60,"WELL";:L(11)=RND(87)+3:GOTO110
215 IFA=14THENL(99)=L(99)+RND(4000)+2000:GOSUB995:PRINT@28,"YUM";:PRINT@60,"YUM!";:GOTO110
216 IFA=4THENFORA=17TO48:IFL(.)<>L(A)THENNEXTA
218 L(A)=91:C(K)=A
220 PRINT@28,"OK! ";:PRINT@60,"    ";:GOTO19
230 N=O*(L(97)+G*L(98))+M-33:FORI=NTON+64STEP32:FORJ=.TO2:IFPEEK(I+J)<>32THENNEXTJ,I:PRINT@28,"NO  ";:PRINT@60,"ROOM";:GOTO110
232 K=C(D-48):L(K)=L(.):IFK>16THENK=4
234 POKEI+J,K+32
236 FORI=D-48TO8:C(I)=C(I+1):NEXTI:GOTO19 
240 J=0:FORI=17TO48:IFL(I)=1ORL(I)=1THENJ=J+I
241 NEXT
242 FORI=49TO96:IFL(I)THENNEXT:GOTO244
243 J=J+INT((I-1)/6)+1:NEXT
244 J=J-L(100)*30:PRINT@92,"IF  ";:PRINT@124,"YOU ";:PRINT@156,"STOP";:PRINT@188,"NOW ";:PRINT@220,"SC= ";:PRINT@380,"Y/N ";
245 PRINT@252,LEFT$(STR$(J)+"    ",4);:PRINT@284,MID$(STR$(J)+"      ",5,4);:PRINT@316,"GIVE";:PRINT@348,"UP? ";:PRINT@412,""
246 X$=INKEY$:IFX$="N"THENFORI=.TO14:PRINT@O*(56+G*I),"    ";:NEXT:GOTO19
247 IFX$="Y"THENPRINT@.,;:END
248 GOTO246
250 IFL(9)<>91THENPRINT@28,"NO  ";:PRINT@60,"BOW!";:GOTO110
251 IFL(13)<>91THENPRINT@28,"NO  ";:PRINT@60,"AR'S";:GOTO110
252 SOUND250,1:IFL(104)=.THENPRINT@28,"ZING";:PRINT@60,"!!!!";:GOTO256
253 IFL(103)>5000THENPRINT@28,"RICO";:PRINT@60,"CHET";:GOTO256
254 N=SQR((L(101)-L(97))^2+(L(102)-L(98))^2):N=81-N:IFRND(100)>NTHENPRINT@28,"A   ";:PRINT@60,"MISS";:GOTO256
255 L(13)=L(.):POKEO*(L(101)+G*L(102))+M,45:A=13:GOSUB910:L(L(104))=.:L(104)=.:PRINT@28,"GOT ";:PRINT@60,"HIM!";:GOTO990
256 GOSUB940:L(13)=L(.):POKEO*(X+G*Y)+M,45:A=13:GOSUB910:L(105)=-1:L(106)=RND(20):GOTO19
260 X=.:Y=.:OND-72GOTO270,264,268,266
264 X=-2:GOTO272
266 X=2:GOTO272
268 Y=1:GOTO272
270 Y=-1
272 X=X+L(97):Y=Y+L(98):Q=PEEK(O*(X+G*Y)+M)
274 IFQ=32THENPOKEO*(L(97)+G*L(98))+M,32:L(97)=X:L(98)=Y:POKEO*(X+G*Y)+M,.:L(99)=L(99)-5:ON-(L(99)>.)GOTO110:GOTO129
275 IFQ=48THENPRINT@28,"BOOM";:PRINT@60,"!!!!";:FORI=1TO40:POKEO*(X+G*Y)+M,RND(32)+143:NEXT:GOSUB991:L(16)=RND(87)+3:GOTO129
276 IFQ<>35THEN280
278 I=RND(86)+3:IFL(1)<>91ANDL(1)<>ITHENGOSUB920:PRINT@28,"PORT";:PRINT@60,"FAIL";:SOUND1,3:GOTO110
279 PRINT@O*(X+G*Y),"POOF!";:FORC=220TO236:SOUNDC,1:NEXT:L(.)=I:GOTO17
280 IFQ<>246THEN283
281 POKEO*(L(97)+G*L(98))+M,32:L(97)=X:L(98)=Y:POKEO*(X+G*Y)+M,.:L(99)=L(99)-RND(200)+100:GOSUB920
282 PRINT@28,"FIRE";:PRINT@60,"OUCH";:SOUND150,1:SOUND50,1:ON-(L(99)>.)GOTO110:GOTO129
283 IFQ<>128THEN110
284 IFL(1)<>91THEN289
285 GOTO970
288 PRINT@28,"A   ";:PRINT@60,"PIT!";:FORI=150TO1STEP-10:SOUNDI,1:NEXT:GOTO129
289 GOSUB920:PRINT@28,"TOO ";:PRINT@60,"DARK";:GOTO110
290 IFL(15)<>91THENPRINT@28,"NO  ";:PRINT@60,"ARMS";:GOTO110
291 IFL(104)=.THENPRINT@28,"HIT";:PRINT@60,"WHAT";:GOTO298
292 IFABS(L(97)-L(101))>2ORABS(L(98)-L(102))>1THENPRINT@28,"YOU ";:PRINT@60,"MISS";:GOTO298
294 L(103)=L(103)-L(99)/5:SOUND200,1:IFL(103)<1THEN297
295 PRINT@28,"GOOD";:PRINT@60,"HIT!";:IFRND(2)=2THENL(105)=-1:L(106)=RND(20)
296 GOTO298
297 PRINT@28,"IT'S";:PRINT@60,"DEAD";:GOSUB991:L(L(104))=0:L(104)=0:POKEO*(L(101)+G*L(102))+M,32
298 L(99)=L(99)-L(99)/20:IFL(99)>.THEN110
299 GOTO129
500 L(104)=0:CR$=R$(L(.)):GOSUB2:PRINT@.,A$;:PRINT@480,A$;
501 FORI=32TO448STEP32:PRINT@I,"¿";:PRINT@I+27,"¿";:NEXT:N=1
502 IFMID$(CR$,N,1)="-"THENN=N+1:GOTO504
503 GOTO950
504 IFN>LEN(CR$)THEN520
505 X=VAL(MID$(CR$,N+1,2)):Y=VAL(MID$(CR$,N+3,2)):ONVAL(MID$(CR$,N,1))GOTO506,508,508,508,509,512:GOTO520
506 PRINT@O*(X+G*Y),LEFT$(A$,O*VAL(MID$(CR$,N+5,2)));:N=N+7:GOTO504
508 S=O*(X+G*Y)+M:D=VAL(MID$(CR$,N,1))+61:FORI=1TOVAL(MID$(CR$,N+5,2)):POKES,191:S=S+D*O:NEXTI:N=N+7:GOTO504
509 S=O*(X+G*Y-65):FORI=0TO2:FORC=-2TO3:IFPEEK(S+I*32+C+M)=32THENPOKES+I*32+C+M,246
510 NEXT:NEXT:N=N+5:GOTO504
512 POKEO*(X+G*Y)+M,46:N=N+5:GOTO504
520 GOSUB960:FORI=1TO16:IFL(I)=L(.)THENGOSUB940:POKEN,I+32
522 NEXT:FORI=17TO48:IFL(I)=L(.)THENGOSUB940:POKEN,36
524 NEXT:FORI=49TO96:IFL(I)=L(.)THENGOSUB940:POKEN,42:L(101)=X:L(102)=Y:L(104)=I:RETURN
525 NEXT:RETURN

900 PRINT@124,"RM"MID$(STR$(L(.))+" ",2,2);:PRINT@508,"STR";:POKEM+511,96
902 FORI=1TO8:IFC(I)=.THENPRINT@156+I*32,"    ";:I=8:NEXT:RETURN
903 PRINT@156+I*32,CHR$(I+48);:IFC(I)>16THENPRINT"$"MID$(STR$(C(I)-16)+" ",2,2);:NEXT:RETURN
904 PRINTMID$(TA$,C(I)*6-5,3);:NEXT:RETURN
910 FORI=1TO8:IFC(I)<>A THENNEXTI:RETURN
911 FORJ=ITO8:C(J)=C(J+1):NEXTJ:RETURN
920 PRINT@28,"    ";:PRINT@60,"    ";:RETURN
940 X=RND(54):Y=RND(14):N=O*(X+G*Y)+M:IFPEEK(N)<>32THEN940
941 RETURN

950 X=VAL(MID$(CR$,N,2)):Y=VAL(MID$(CR$,N+2,2)):POKEO*(X+G*Y)+M,128:N=N+10:GOTO502

960 IFL(97)=1THENL(97)=2
961 IFL(97)>52THENL(97)=52
962 POKEO*(L(97)+G*L(98))+M,.:RETURN

970 FORI=1TO91STEP10:IFINT(X/2)=INT(VAL(MID$(CR$,I,2))/2)ANDY=VAL(MID$(CR$,I+2,2))THEN973
972 NEXTI:GOTO110
973 C=I:I=91:NEXTI:I=C:L(.)=VAL(MID$(CR$,I+4,2)):IFL(.)=92THEN288
987 L(97)=VAL(MID$(CR$,I+6,2)):L(98)=VAL(MID$(CR$,I+8,2)):GOTO17

990 GOSUB991:GOTO19
991 SOUND64,4:SOUND64,2:SOUND64,2:SOUND87,8:RETURN

995 IFL(99)>9999THENL(99)=9999
996 RETURN

999 M=16384:G=64

2000 POKE49151,64:PRINTTAB(11)"WELCOME TO":PRINTTAB(8)"MAZIES & CRAZIES!":PRINT:PRINT" /=SWORD   !=TORCH   #=PORTAL"
2013 PRINT" (=SHIELD  )=BOW     -=ARROW":PRINT" +=POTION  .=FRUIT   $=TREASURE":PRINT" RETURN TREASURES TO ROOM ONE"
2014 PRINT:PRINT"USE: ijkl TO MOVE"
2018 PRINT"     q FOR SCORE AND TO QUIT":PRINT"     t TO TAKE":PRINT"     # TO DROP":PRINT"     s TO SHOOT"
2022 PRINT"     f TO FIGHT":DIMG,M,L(107),C(9),R$(90):GOSUB999:GOTO5
